Squizzy::

She was struck and felt the needle plune into her. She fell forward 
and landed on her hands and knees. She turned her head, looking at 
LadyHawk, "Why? I thought you were a friend?" She felt sick to her 
stomach and light headed. She couldn't understand, why was this bot 
of science attacking her. "I wanted to see the nature bots too." She 
fell down and layed on her side. She felt disoriented and fearful.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> "I think it's time to take you to another leader. These relics can 
do no
> more good then they already have." Lady Hawk says drawing a needle 
from her
> side. She swings hard at Squizzy planning on removing the threat 
she was.
> Lady Hawk planned on stunning the bot then destroying it.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <logomorph@h...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Saturday, November 04, 2000 1:41 PM
> Subject: Re: Watching the Allience
> 
> 
> > Squizzy::
> >
> > She turned to LadyHawk.  "As much as I would like not to fight, I 
can
> > not stand by and not try to assist my leader. I am sorry, but I 
have
> > to at least try. Besides, these are tranquilizer darts, not 
regular
> > ammo.  Therefore, the bot who I shoot at will not die."
> >
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > Lady Hawk transforms to Hawk mode and flies over to 
Squizzy. "Hold
> > on little
> > > one, sit back and watch the fight you'll learn a lot more that 
way
> > and
> > > you're less likely to be shot." Lady Hawk saw great potential in
> > this bot
> > > for some odd reason she wanted to keep Squizzy around. She saw
> > nothing for
> > > the Alliance but destruction and knew that there was no way 
she'd
> > let her
> > > fathers dream be distorted by the likes of them. She had the
> > printouts from
> > > the CR chambers, and her father had the skill to recreate the 
DNA
> > patterns
> > > he needed. There wasn't a reason to stay other than to watch the
> > fight. It
> > > was the perfect chance to escape, unfortunately Squizzy knew to
> > much about
> > > her experiments to be left behind. She couldn't leave the 
mongoose
> > behind
> > > while it was still functioning. something had to be done soon 
and
> > she had to
> > > decide what it was.
